There are many things that I love about Dublin. My favourite, however, is that you're never too far from a Fair City star.

Reviewed Phases by Angel Olsen for @thethinair. It highlights the many phases (ðŸ˜‰) of her career with a compilation of rarities and B-sides. In all, it's gets a B- rating and a very mild berating. https://t.co/FVfgQgPOAD https://t.co/pyq9Bgyfe8
